Name: High Smileson
About the game: Tired of challenge, rushing, and competition? We don't have it!!! The cute little snail will take you to a world of relaxation, positive vibes, and only good news ^_^. Read inspiring little stories about High Smileson and find his friend - High Snailson in every picture. This game is about finding yourself, your inner peace, and enjoying small simple moments in life. A world created from the works of the popular Internet artist High Smileson. This is a short but relaxing and fun click-read-find game. - Find all the mini-stories on the world map, along the way finding snails in each picture. - Cartoon graphics - Great relaxing music - A hero who will teach you not to worry about the difficulties of life - Easy gameplay!
